title: Confusion: diagnosis and management
creator_credit: Scottish Health Education Unit and Sidhartha Films
brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Health education and the elderly”.
One in a series about techniques for the management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. This episode looks in some detail, at the various causes of acute confusion, outlining the basic principles of treatment.
